name: Evaluation Framework for SOC LLMs
summary: Vendor-agnostic benchmark scoring LLM copilots for security operations across proactive and reactive workflows.
outcomes: Normalizes multi-source logs into ECS/STIX schemas and aligns incidents to MITRE ATT&CK tactics.
Scores detection accuracy, hallucination rate, IOC extraction quality, latency, cost, and explainability depth across Anthropic, OpenAI, Gemini, LLaMA, DeepSeek, and Qwen.

name: Financial Management Hub (Serverless AWS App)
summary: Self-service finance automation leveraging Plaid and OpenAI to uncover spending insights with high availability.
outcomes: Built on AWS Amplify, Lambda, and DynamoDB with Terraform and GitHub Actions for consistent, automated deploys.
Dockerized services and integrated cost guardrails to maintain 99.99% uptime with predictable billing.

name: Travel Itinerary Planner with Google ADK Agents
summary: Multi-agent planning experience creating personalized itineraries with transparent decision-making.
outcomes: Ranked attractions and itineraries with Google ADK agents orchestrated through Vertex AI and BigQuery.
Applied IAM and cost optimization controls ensuring a secure, scalable, and budget-aware platform.
